Entry.Name: Allow All Hostname
Entry.Description: This app does not check the validation of the CN (Common Name) in the SSL certificate (`"ALLOW_ALL_HOSTNAME_VERIFIER"` field or `"AllowAllHostnameVerifier"` class). This implementations can lead to vulnerabilities which can be used to perform MiTM (Man-in-The-Middle) attacks on network traffic from the victim application.

Mitigation.Textual:
To strengthen security, any code that bypasses SSL certificate validation should be removed and app should relied to default implementations.
The solution may vary, depending on the app implementation.
